StateCommunicationListener

@objc
public protocol StateCommunicationListener : NSObjectProtocol

StateCommunicationListener is a protocol which bridges a Communication from and to a State

  • communicateFromState(_:)

    Implement this method to create a bridge from and to a State

    Since

    Since 1.1.0

    Declaration

    Swift

    func communicateFromState(_ state: BaseState?) -> AnyObject?

    Parameters

    stateId

    State Id of the State which wants to Communicate with/from any outside resource
